Featured-image: C235-navy-a-line-long-evening-dress-with-beaded-bodice_p.jpg

----

Description: A form fitting skirt is split in the front and features a court train in the back. The sheer bodice is covered with jewels and beads that is an intricate feather design. The sheer back of the gown scallops at the waistline.
